name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: policy_id
description: Local Coverage Determination (LCD) identifier for Sacral Nerve Stimulation for the Treatment of Urinary and Fecal Incontinence (L39543).

name: procedure_sacral_nerve_stimulation
description: Sacral Nerve Stimulation (SNS) or Sacral Neuromodulation (SNM) involves delivering nonpainful, electrical pulses to sacral nerves to modulate reflexes that influence the bladder, sphincter, and pelvic floor function.

name: condition_urinary_incontinence
description: Involuntary loss of urine, including urinary urge incontinence and urgency-frequency syndrome, for which SNS/SNM is covered.

name: condition_fecal_incontinence
description: Chronic involuntary loss of stool, for which SNS/SNM is covered.

name: condition_overactive_bladder_OAB
description: A condition characterized by urgency, urge incontinence, and frequency, for which SNM is a treatment.

name: condition_nonobstructive_urinary_retention
description: Urinary retention that is not caused by a physical obstruction, for which SNS/SNM is covered.

name: procedure_sns_temporary_test_stimulation
description: Temporary test stimulation performed to determine if an implantable stimulator would be effective, a covered component of SNS for urinary incontinence.

name: procedure_sns_permanent_implantation
description: Permanent implantation of a sacral nerve stimulator in appropriate candidates, a covered component of SNS for urinary incontinence.

name: eligibility_refractory_to_conventional_therapy_urinary_incontinence
description: Patient must be refractory to conventional therapy (documented behavioral, pharmacologic, and/or surgical corrective therapy) for urinary incontinence.

name: eligibility_appropriate_surgical_candidate
description: Patient must be an appropriate surgical candidate such that implantation with anesthesia can occur.

name: exclusion_stress_incontinence
description: Patients with stress incontinence are excluded from SNS coverage.

name: exclusion_urinary_obstruction
description: Patients with urinary obstruction are excluded from SNS coverage.

name: exclusion_neurologic_disease_urinary_incontinence
description: Patients with specific neurologic diseases (e.g., diabetes with peripheral nerve involvement, multiple sclerosis, spinal cord injury) associated with secondary manifestations of urinary incontinence indications are excluded from SNS coverage.

name: eligibility_test_stimulation_improvement_percentage_urinary_incontinence
description: Patient must demonstrate 50% or greater improvement through test stimulation to support subsequent permanent implantation for urinary incontinence.

name: program_requirements_test_stimulation_measurement_method
description: Improvement from test stimulation for urinary incontinence is measured through voiding diaries.

name: eligibility_patient_ability_to_record_voiding_diary_data
description: Patient must be able to demonstrate adequate ability to record voiding diary data for proper evaluation of implant procedure results.

name: eligibility_fecal_incontinence_episodes_per_week_threshold
description: For FI coverage, patient must have greater than 2 incontinent episodes on average per week.

name: eligibility_fecal_incontinence_duration_months
description: For FI coverage, duration of incontinence must be greater than 6 months.

name: eligibility_fecal_incontinence_duration_post_childbirth_months
description: For FI coverage, duration of incontinence must be greater than 12 months after vaginal childbirth.

name: eligibility_refractory_to_conventional_therapy_fecal_incontinence
description: For FI coverage, documented failure or intolerance to conventional therapy (e.g., dietary modification, bulking and pharmacologic treatment) is required.

name: eligibility_percutaneous_test_stimulation_improvement_percentage_fecal_incontinence
description: For FI coverage, a successful percutaneous test stimulation is defined as at least 50% sustained improvement in symptoms.

name: eligibility_percutaneous_test_stimulation_sustained_improvement_duration_hours
description: For FI coverage, sustained improvement from percutaneous test stimulation must last more than 48 hours.

name: exclusion_anorectal_malformation
description: FI coverage excludes conditions related to anorectal malformation (e.g., congenital malformation, defects of the external anal sphincter over 60 degrees, visible sequelae of pelvic radiation, active anal abscesses and fistulae).

name: exclusion_chronic_inflammatory_bowel_disease
description: FI coverage excludes conditions related to chronic inflammatory bowel disease.

name: exclusion_neurologic_condition_fecal_incontinence
description: FI coverage excludes incontinence related to another neurologic condition such as peripheral neuropathy or complete spinal cord injury.

name: non_covered_condition_chronic_constipation
description: Sacral Nerve Stimulation is considered experimental/investigational for the treatment of chronic constipation.

name: non_covered_condition_chronic_pelvic_pain
description: Sacral Nerve Stimulation is considered experimental/investigational for the treatment of chronic pelvic pain (CPP).

name: device_interstim_therapy_system
description: A sacral nerve stimulation device (Medtronic InterStimTM Therapy/System) used in studies for SNS/SNM.

name: device_axonics_system
description: A rechargeable sacral neuromodulation system (Axonics® System) approved for OAB, nonobstructive urinary retention, and FI, compatible with full body MRI scans.

name: device_axonics_system_functional_life_years
description: The approved functional life of the Axonics® System, at least 15 years.

name: documentation_required_history_physical_exam
description: A complete history and physical examination must be documented in the patient's medical record.

name: documentation_required_voiding_diaries
description: Voiding diaries must be documented in the patient's medical record.

name: documentation_required_urodynamic_studies
description: Urodynamic studies for urinary incontinence must be documented in the patient's medical record.

name: related_document_billing_coding_article_id
description: Related article ID for billing and coding information for Sacral Nerve Stimulation: A59332.

name: related_document_response_to_comments_article_id
description: Related article ID for response to comments on Sacral Nerve Stimulation: A59520.

name: related_document_archived_lcd_id
description: Related archived LCD ID for Sacral Nerve Stimulation: DL39543.

name: related_ncd_sacral_nerve_stimulation_urinary_incontinence_id
description: Related National Coverage Determination (NCD) ID for Sacral Nerve Stimulation for Urinary Incontinence: 230.18.
